item.title: WebPageTest and Lighthouse Terms
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: WebPageTest and Lighthouse have diverged a bit on terminology. I recently came across a Github WebPageTest issue where this came up and wanted to note it here for easy reference: Relative to lighthouse: WPT’s FirstInteractive === Lighthouse’s First CPU Idle WPT’s ConsistentlyInteractive === Lighthouse’s Time To Interactive
item.content:encoded:
WebPageTest and Lighthouse have diverged a bit on terminology. I recently came across a Github WebPageTest issue where this came up and wanted to note it here for easy reference:

Relative to lighthouse:

WPT’s FirstInteractive === Lighthouse’s First CPU Idle
WPT’s ConsistentlyInteractive === Lighthouse’s Time To Interactive
